text: Phyllanthus emblica Triphala ("three fruits") is an Ayurvedic herbal rasayana formula consisting of equal parts of three myrobalans, taken without seed: Amalaki (Phyllanthus emblica), Bibhitaki (Terminalia bellirica), and Haritaki (Terminalia chebula). One report indicates it contains vitamin C. ==See also== *Ayurveda *Rasayana ==References== Category:Ayurvedic medicaments
title: Triphala
